snippet: PepsiCo is introducing new “Star Wars”-themed product packaging and a mobile game app to promote Brisk tea to its target market, young men under 30.
abstract: Jane L Levere Advertising column notes PepsiCo is introducing new Star Wars-themed product packaging and a mobile game app to promote Brisk tea to its target market, men under 30.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo is introducing new “Star Wars”-themed product packaging and a mobile game app to promote Brisk tea to its target market, young men under 30.

headline.seo: To Promote Brisk Tea, Pepsi Enlists the Aid of Yoda
